I think we do not need to support making autotext as a template report item, maybe model needs to give proper error and UI to disable the action?

We use ReportElementHandle.canTransformToTemplate() to check if the element can be converted to ReportTemplateItem, and I find that AutoTextHandle.canTransformToTemplate() is true, it means that this item can be converted to ReportTemplateItem. But when converting it, an error occur.

I think it's Model's bug, reassign it to Model.

Fixed.

Now not support template for auto text. Model will return false in method canTransformToTemplate() to disable the action.
